name: Tic Tac Toe (itch) (BABA_Jankes)
description:
Tic Tac Toe is one of the best puzzle based games which will keep you entertained when you are bored. Tic Tac Toe has a very smart AI which will make the game fun to play.

KEY FEATURES:
~smart AI
~3 difficulty levels
~NO ads

Tic Tac Toe is a free to play game without ads.
